blog.name: super-hero-confessions
blog.title: Super-Hero-Confessions
blog.description:
Super-hero-confessions is a blog where you can submit your confessions/personal opinions about any of the super hero movies, comics, television shows, cartoons, etc.

The confessions that are posted are those that are submitted; not the opinions of the blog owners. All the confessions will be anonymous when posted. Feel free to submit photos along with your confession if you would like as well.

If you want us to see a post tag it with either #superheroconfessions or #superhero confessions

summary: tony sleeps like every 4th night and sustains himself only on cheetos and ungodly amounts of coffee and mama bear bucky is...
body: tony sleeps like every 4th night and sustains himself only on cheetos and ungodly amounts of coffee and mama bear bucky is Worried™ but cant do shit abt it so when tony does a photoshoot for mens health magazine, bucky’s just flipping angrily through his interview like: “‘your body is a temple’ how rich. last time he ate anything organic was my own ass just this morning. oh, 'exercise is important’ ? is that why you train my fucking patience every damn day? you fun-sized bitch,” and tony goes “stop. im dying here” and bucky doesnt miss a beat when he says “yea, from cardiac arrest you unhealthy Fuck”

summary: Tony is the Donald Trump of the mcu. I hope will stay alive, he doesn't deserve a to die like a hero. He is a shit person that...
question: Tony is the Donald Trump of the mcu. I hope will stay alive, he doesn't deserve a to die like a hero. He is a shit person that deserves the worst.
answer:
Lmao I am not understanding this comparison between Tony Stark, a man who risks his life to save others and dedicates his fortune to the same thing, to Donald fucking Trump. Please, I’m dying to understand your reasoning.

But it’s fine that you hate this character for no given reason, you have the right to think what you want Anon. But you don’t need to bring that hate to me. All you’ve done is prove my point about people hating him without justification.

reblog.comment:

But it’s fine that you hate this character for no given reason, you have the right to think what you want Anon. But you don’t need to bring that hate to me. All you’ve done is prove my point about people hating him without justification.

trail.content_raw:
Lmao I am not understanding this comparison between Tony Stark, a man who risks his life to save others and dedicates his fortune to the same thing, to Donald fucking Trump. Please, I’m dying to understand your reasoning.

But it’s fine that you hate this character for no given reason, you have the right to think what you want Anon. But you don’t need to bring that hate to me. All you’ve done is prove my point about people hating him without justification.
trail.content:
Lmao I am not understanding this comparison between Tony Stark, a man who risks his life to save others and dedicates his fortune to the same thing, to Donald fucking Trump. Please, I’m dying to understand your reasoning.

But it’s fine that you hate this character for no given reason, you have the right to think what you want Anon. But you don’t need to bring that hate to me. All you’ve done is prove my point about people hating him without justification.

summary: Tony, seeing Harley and Peter: i have two great sons and my wife is pregnant. I don't need any more kids. I have a perfect...
body:
Tony, seeing Harley and Peter: i have two great sons and my wife is pregnant. I don’t need any more kids. I have a perfect family.

Tony: [sees Gamora and Nebula]

Tony: Peter! Harley! Come meet your new space sisters!

blog.name: platonicironmanimagines
blog.title: Platonic Iron Man Imagines
blog.description: "I'm the best."  Because having Tony Stark as a best friend would be a chaotic, insane, and mildly entertaining experience. I just write for him.

summary: hey there. sorry if this is weird but could you write an imagine or whatever where the reader is bisexual and it's having a hard...
question: hey there. sorry if this is weird but could you write an imagine or whatever where the reader is bisexual and it's having a hard time coming to grips with it/coming out? if you don't want to that's totally fine but um yeah. thank you
answer:
• so, tony would realize the little subconscious hints you drop because his gaydar is actually v efficient 
  • and whenever your eyes would linger too long on a pretty guy or girl, regardless of gender, he’d give you that knowing look
    • eyebrow raised, side glance at the person, and then a look back at you with his sunglasses perched on the tip of his nose with a look that screams ‘oh, honey’
  • if you don’t tell him straight-out, he’d simply fold his arms and casually nod in their direction
    • “hey, smash or pass that person over there?”
  • the stark foundation would also make sure to pull one of those grand lgbt support events, too
    • whether it be rainbow fireworks (and one specifically in the bi flag colours), or a change in company policy, or anything else
    • a donation to programs like Run for Rocky and other gay support programs/events
    • “tony why”
    • “oh, no reason. just think they needed more support. plus, i’ve already dropped millions on boring girl scouts and whatever. thought i’d shake it up a little.”
  • and he’d never make it obvious and say you have to tell him that you’re bi
  • in fact, you might not ever have to say it in general.
  • like, he’d appreciate the trust you put in him if you did, but
  • you two are such good friends and tony’s pretty decent at reading that sort of thing, so you’d eventually come to terms with the fact that he already knows
    • that being said, if you got annoyed at his continuous nods towards it, if you seriously tell him to stop he would
  • but when it comes to advice about coming out, you’d have to ask him properly about what he thinks
    • and tony is all like “hon, let’s be real, i knew ages ago”
    • “yes, tony, i know. now can you help me out?”
  • and he’d suggest you do it, because you should be proud of who you are and the variety of options you can do the dirty with
    • the last part is mostly a joke but you can never tell with tony
  • and at the very least, everyone at the compound would accept you, and if they didn’t, he’d have words.
  • either way, he’s proud of you for who you are, and thinks you should be, too.
  • that’s all that matters, really.

blog.name: incorrect-ironstrange
blog.title: Endgame is NOT Canon on This Blog
blog.description:
Repentant stony shipper.  Ironstrange and supremefamily content. Main blog @lucifers-favorite-child. Posts tagged #incorrect-ironstrange. Icon from @hello-shellhead. 
I write on AO3 as lucifersfavoritechild .
Throw money at me: http://ko-fi.com/V7V6IXJK.
Long live the irondick!
...
I guess this is a Peter and Stephen stan blog now.

title: (΄◉◞౪◟◉｀)
body:
Tony: How was school Peter?
Peter:٩(๑❛ᴗ❛๑)۶
Tony: What… how…
Peter: ٩( ‘ω’ )و
Tony: How are you doing that?!
Peter: ╰(*´︶`*)╯
Tony: PETER!
Peter: ( T_T)＼(^-^ ) ♡

Earlier…

Shuri: I have this thing…

blog.name: marvelficrec
blog.title: Marvel Fic Recs
blog.description:
A blog dedicated to finding all the best Tony Stark centric fic recs. Feel free to request what you want using the ask box! I specialize in stevetony, buckytony, and stevebuckytony.
check out the master lists!
angst | fluff | smut

tags: only 4 more left in the ask box wowowoowow
summary: Uh, I’m looking for stories with Tony time travelling to 1940? Meeting pre-serum Steve and past Bucky. Any genre will do. Thank...
question: Uh, I’m looking for stories with Tony time travelling to 1940? Meeting pre-serum Steve and past Bucky. Any genre will do. Thank you!
answer:
